name: Kinver Edge Village Trail, Kinver Edge

ai.summary: An easy 4.2 km circular hike on the Kinver Edge ridge, offering scenic countryside views and the historic Kinver Edge Village. Suitable for families and beginners.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-maintained paths with gentle to moderate elevation. Some uneven ground and short rocky sections; the route runs along the sandstone ridge with exposed edges in places and shaded woodland sections inland.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear and stay back from cliff edges, especially in wind or rain; keep children and dogs under control; check the weather and avoid the ridge in stormy or icy conditions; stay on marked paths; bring water, sun protection and a light layer for changing conditions.
ai.best_seasons: Spring and autumn are ideal for mild weather and good views; summer is fine on dry days; winter can be windy and icy on exposed ridges.

seo.title: Kinver Edge Village Trail – Easy 4.2 km Ridge Walk
seo.meta_description: Explore Kinver Edge Village Trail, an easy 4.2 km circular walk along the Kinver Edge ridge in the UK. Scenic views, family-friendly terrain, and practical safety tips.
seo.h1: Kinver Edge Village Trail – Easy 4.2 km Ridge Walk
